channel.title: How do I install a server on a xen linux server?
channel.description: I have a linux xen vps, and I was wondering if it's possible to run the server on the vps. Cause I can not seem to find out how to run the .bat files... I can not connect to teh vps remotely, but I can connect via hypervm panel. Please can someone help me?

item.title: How do I install a server on a xen linux server?
item.dc:creator: @IWBTG IWBTG
item.description:
@IWBTG wrote:

You don’t run batch files on anything but windows.
For Linux, you use .sh shell scripts, or just use the terminal.

In the terminal, if you want to run a server in the background, basicly

cd your server path here
nohup java server

Should work etc, and if you need to restart it, just kill the process number and do it over again.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I install a server on a xen linux server?
